TopicTitle: how did you find out about ksp??

Articles.Content: I actually don't know, I think found out about it when I was about 8 or 9, and my first Duna mission was so bad it wasn't even funny

I stumbled upon KSP at random. I read the website, tried the demo game, and played around with that for a while, then pulled the trigger on version 0.18.4.

The rest is history.
